title: dualActiveBridge
description: The description of a Dual Active Bridge (DAB) converter excitation

inputVoltage.description: The input voltage of the DAB converter

seriesInductance.description: The series inductance for power transfer control. If 0, uses transformer leakage inductance

useLeakageInductance.description: Whether to use transformer leakage inductance as the series inductor

dabOperatingPoint.description: The description of one DAB operating point
dabOperatingPoint.title: dabOperatingPoint

outputVoltages.description: A list of output voltages, one per output

outputCurrents.description: A list of output currents, one per output

phaseShift.description: The phase shift at this operating point in degrees

switchingFrequency.description: The switching frequency of the operating point

ambientTemperature.description: The ambient temperature of the operating point
